references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models and introduced the core concept of denoising diffusion models.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced Stable Diffusion, a significant advancement in latent diffusion models and a widely used model in image generation.
This paper addresses a key challenge in the field by proposing novel methods for the exact inversion of diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Align your latents: High-resolution video synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper expands the application of latent diffusion models to video generation, showcasing a significant advance in the area.

references.paper_title: InstaFlow: One step is enough for high-quality diffusion-based text-to-image generation
references.reason: This paper provides another significant improvement in diffusion model architecture, allowing for faster and more efficient generation of images.
